GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
powerpc/xive: Fix refcount leak in xive_spapr_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 6e806485d851986a2445267608f27cb4ba2ed774, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit eac1e731b59ee3b5f5e641a7765c7ed41ed26226. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: powerpc/xive: Fix refcount leak in xive_spapr_init
